channel.title: Cool idea with robes and non silab server
channel.description:
ok now I was bored and I was thinking wouldent it be cool if i could set this up :
the monster i found a monster ( steel dragon ) its code is 1592 or 3590 ,i am going to make the steel dragon hit like 35-80 so it will be very hard to kill , it will also have like 250 hp.
the drop now it is going to only drop gems diamond, emerald , sapphire , ruby , onyx ,d stone ( 1601 , 1605 , 1607 , 1603 , 6573 , 1615 )
now gems not a big deal but i am going to sell desert robes on my server now robes ( no clue on what the robes are going to be )are going to be horrible like 1 on everything...
but when you use a gem on a robe piece which you will buy from a store for a sum of money( about 2m) now you have robes im thinking that ill make them gold robes but when you use a gem on them or a piece of the robe they become or swap for fremmy robes now the gem color will be the color of the fremmy robes ( like ruby = crimson robes )
now the robes will have ceartin stats like green = range ect...
now here is where i need your help i can change the stats of the robes on my own
i need help with :
> making the gold robe swap for the fremmy robe
> planting the dragons and changing there hits and hp( if hp is too hard just hits would be awsome)
>also i would like to put a shop in with just the gold robes but i can just shove them in with another shop if you think i should
> and if you feel like being extra special maby, a place to put the dragons and portals to get there
extra info
my base is satan isle oops this was a line i wasent supposto put here im not the greatest coder and if you can do this you own!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! the fremmy robe codes:3686-3798 also i do not have skill capes so this shouldent mess up fremmy robe codes :) this is not silab![br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2007, 05:07:33 PM[/size][hr]o yes and i for got how do i set up what the dragon drops

item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

To change the hp go into npc.cfg look for the npc id and change the second number under hp and for autospawn cfg look for a download on all runescape monsters and paste it in there.

Read full topic
